nodes.text: The Cybloc Transfer Station, also known as the InterGalactic storehouse station, was an InterGalactic Banking Clan space station located in the Cybloc system during the Clone Wars.

The Cybloc transfer station was attacked by the Sith brothers Darth Maul and Savage Opress. The two brothers sliced through the many security droids on the station, raiding it in order to draw the attention of the Jedi Order and, specifically, Obi-Wan Kenobi.
